entry.title: WIND WARNING , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:38 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Causapscal Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: SE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain late this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
